title: Hour 3 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 3 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and in the spirit of the new school year, the guys talk about their favorite gym class activities. Fernando Tatis Jr. will be suspended 80 games on the heels of a positive test for a banned substance, and now the father, Tatis Sr. is sharing what really happened, and Rich totally believes his story.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
